content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing iron ore
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring iron ore from the chest to the furnace

### Coal Plate Production Facility at Position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing coal
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring coal from the chest to the furnace

### Additional Furnaces at Positions (-11.0, -48.0) and (-9.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0) with no ingredients to smelt

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items with insufficient inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a structure. This will prevent errors related to insufficient inventory.

### Warnings about full chests
- Regularly check and empty chests that are full to allow continuous mining and prevent stoppages in resource extraction.

### Warnings about furnaces with no ingredients
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to process. Regularly supply them with the required ores to maintain production efficiency.
